name: Snail Racing Pro
description:
Snail Racing Pro. No Ads.

Don't be sluggish download Snail Racing now.

We're off to the horse races ... er make that Snail Races with this carnival favourite.

Easy to play, just throw your ping pong balls into the holes to race your favourite snail towards the finish line.

If your little gastropod is the first to slither across the finish line then you'll win a hand full of tickets. Compete with your friends online to see who can collect the most tickets and also unlock new exciting snails.

The more you play, the more you win, the more tickets you collect!

There are 5 snails in each race, each controlled by one of the 5 boards. The 2 outside boards are already taken, but the 3 middle ones are available so up to 3 people can play at the same time.

This is a quick game with stacks of balls and turbo snail racing action. You'll need to be quick and accurate to get your little chap slipping & sliding along.

Click on your lane number to change your snail, initially there are 5 to choose from but there are more available as you collect winning tokens.

Collect tokens to unlock other snails, including steam punk snail, space snail, and stone age snail.

Another of our fabulous retro carnival games, Turbo Snail Racing.
